Types
About The purpose of the Deposit Diary, is to allow users who suffer with IBS and IBD to document and track their daily motions and in case of flare ups. \n\The users can record their type of stool, how many motions they have had, the level of pain and average duration. \n\Within the edit section of the app users can write notes about their days and keep track of important notes, which they can show to their General Practitioner or specialist so their records can be updated. \n\Another feature implemented into this application is a map, which allows the user to look at public toilets within their vicinity when out.
